description: The Spriggans were the elite wing divers that appeared in "Earth Defense Force 5." They are a group of flying Amazons who often joined the protagonist's missions. Along with the Grim Reapers, the Spriggans, and their strong-minded and confident leader, are popular NPCs. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Wing Diver that uses these sassy sisters' colors. She of course comes equipped with a Mag Blaster for her weapon. Now, head to the battle as an Amazon to teach those aliens to fear the EDF.
name: Wing Diver (EDF5), Spriggan Colors & Special Gear
